name: A Very Consistent First Person Shooter Game
name_original: A Very Consistent First Person Shooter Game
description:
In this DOOM-like FPS game, keep an eye on your back because these guys can catch you with your pants down. Furthermore, the longer you survive, the more chaotic things become. Isn't that well-balanced?

This game is not yet finished.  There will be a lot of stuff to consider adding to the game, so be sure to come back for more updates!

Instructions:

WASD: Movement.

LSHIFT + W: Sprint

LMB: Shoot.

R: Reload your gun instantly (for the time being...).

Q: Deploy an IMPALER.

1/2: switch weapons.
